com.cinchapi.concourse.db

Interface Persistable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ByteSized
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cell, CommitLog, CommitLog.Commit, Row, Value

    public interface Persistable
extends ByteSized
    An object that can be written to a FileChannel.
    Author:
    jnelson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Persistable.Writer
      A class that implements the writeTo(FileChannel) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getBytes()
      Encodes the object into a sequence for the purpose of writing the bytes to a FileChannel.
      void writeTo(java.nio.channels.FileChannel channel)
      Write the object to a writable channel.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cinchapi.concourse.db.ByteSized

        size

    • Method Detail

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
        Encodes the object into a sequence for the purpose of writing the bytes to a FileChannel. This method is called from Persistable.Writer.write(Persistable, FileChannel).
        Specified by:
        getBytes in interface ByteSized
        Returns:
        the byte sequence.

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(java.nio.channels.FileChannel channel)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Write the object to a writable channel. This method should acquire a lock over the region from the channels current position plus the ByteSized.size() of the value. The caller is responsible for ensuring that the channel is in the correct position before and after this method has run. In general, call Persistable.Writer.write(Persistable, FileChannel) from this method.
        Parameters:
        channel -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        Persistable.Writer#write(Persistable, FileChannel)}
